title: EMPOWERING FUTURES: UNVEILING OUR STORY AT D6
description1: Welcome to d6 immersive studio, where we pioner a new era in work-based training and placement for animation, gaming, and immersive technologies like virtual Reality (VR) and Augmented Reality (AR), NDisplay etc. Our mission is to not equip you with cutting-edge skills but also to seamlessly connect you with industry opportunities that match your passion and expertise.
